title: Danila Buranov
text:
Danila Olegovich Buranov (; born 11 February 1996) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays as a <a href="defensive%20midfielder">defensive midfielder</a> for <a href="FC%20Peresvet%20Podolsk">Peresvet Podolsk</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Professional%20Football%20League">Russian Professional Football League</a> for <a href="FC%20Spartak-2%20Moscow">Spartak-2 Moscow</a> on 25 May 2014 in a game against <a href="FC%20Oryol">Oryol</a>.
Arsenal Tula.
In February 2017, he signed a contract with <a href="FC%20Arsenal%20Tula">Arsenal Tula</a>. He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for Arsenal on 19 March 2017 in a game against <a href="FC%20Zenit%20Saint%20Petersburg">FC Zenit Saint Petersburg</a>.
In February 2019, after six month on loan with <a href="FC%20Strogino%20Moscow">Strogino Moscow</a> he joined <a href="FC%20Zenit-2%20Saint%20Petersburg">Zenit-2 St. Petersburg</a> on loan again.
Mordovia Saransk.
On 3 July 2019, he signed with <a href="FC%20Mordovia%20Saransk">FC Mordovia Saransk</a>.
